solution_line_template: The four bags of Reese's cost ${reeses_price_per_bag} x {reeses_bags} = $<<{reeses_price_per_bag}*{reeses_bags}={reeses_total}>>{reeses_total}.
The three bags of Snickers cost ${snickers_price_per_bag} x {snickers_bags} = $<<{snickers_price_per_bag}*{snickers_bags}={snickers_total}>>{snickers_total}.
The five bags of Skittles cost ${skittles_price_per_bag} x {skittles_bags} = $<<{skittles_price_per_bag}*{skittles_bags}={skittles_total}>>{skittles_total}.

Therefore, the unicorn piñata and the treats cost ${pinata_price} + ${reeses_total} + ${snickers_total} + ${skittles_total} = $<<{pinata_price}+{reeses_total}+{snickers_total}+{skittles_total}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
